# __[Latest Stable Version](https://github.com/shoghicp/PocketMine-MP/tags)__

## __[Check the Wiki!](https://github.com/shoghicp/PocketMine-MP/wiki)__

## __[FAQ: Frequently Asked Questions](https://github.com/shoghicp/PocketMine-MP/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions)__

**Project Status: `ALPHA`**

Current features of the server:
-------------------------------
* Full Creative mode!
* Plugin API
* Custom world generation
* Update Channels!! (stable / dev)


How to contact me
-----------------
* Email - <shoghicp@gmail.com>
* Twitter - [@shoghicp](https://twitter.com/shoghicp)
* Via IRC - #mcdevs or #mcpedevs on *irc.freenode.net* (or just /msg me there)
* [MinecraftForums profile](http://www.minecraftforum.net/user/1476633-shoghicp/)
